plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photos to let you share them.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to let you take photos.

plugins.calendarPermission: This app needs access to your calendar to help you manage events and schedules.
plugins.remindersPermission: This app needs access to your reminders to help you manage tasks and notifications.

infoPlist.NSAppleIntelligenceUsageDescription: This app uses Apple Intelligence to provide enhanced AI-powered responses and contextual assistance.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to provide contextual AI responses and location-based queries when you're actively using the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to provide contextual AI responses and location-based queries for enhanced user experience.
